name: Time Collision
description:
Time Collision is a unique 4-person battle arena taking place in a surreal time-warped colosseum, where each player will race to gather various objects on the field and use them as projectiles to fight one another.  The more objects you possess, the more damage you can inflict and endure. Grab the controllers, invite your friends, fight to be the last man standing inside the shrinking safe zone, so you can emerge victorious!

Made by Team Funktion © 2019

Jacob Grahmann, Mitchell Henrie, Zhuyi "Victor" Liu, James Baggett, Carson Ivory, Lin Pan

Self-published by Zhuyi "Victor" Liu
